name: Stormy Weathers
description:
Stormy Weathers

Enjoy flying through nice peaceful clouds, pick up health packs and take speed boost, then die by mines, lightning and UFO's. It's all possible in Stormy Weathers, our new free to play game where you need to fly as far as you can, dodging enemies left and right, doing barrel rolls and shooting missles. However don't forget to enjoy the calm and peaceful clouds.

Controls (only controller support):
Rotate Plane: Left-Stick
Steer Left: LB
Steer Right: RB
Accelerate: RT
Fire missiles: A
